title: Market economy in the early 19th century - cause

content.question: The expansion of a market economy in the early nineteenth century is reflected in which of the following?

choices.label: The decline of the slave system in the South
The improvement of transportation and availability of goods
The formation of strong labor unions
The continued growth of home labor and cottage industries

content.answer: The improvement of transportation and availability of goods

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
